page.title: 09FARMING 2
page.content: The investigators were surprised to discover that only one out of the ten farms,{Rose Farm,}had a dairy herd,one of 25 cows.Only 3 of the farms kept cattle for beef.These were bought in early in the year and sold in Autumn. It was also noticeable that only a few of the farmers kept chickens etc. for their own use.The main crops grown were wheat,barley,oats,potatoes and peas. One new crop,{oil seed rape,}had been introduced in the past two years. Hay was made in the traditional way on most farms but Upper Moss Side Farm had started a new venture.They had sold their field of grass to a contractor.He had cut the grass,taken it away and made it into small grass cubes for animal food.All the farms had shed workers in the past few years The work is mainly done by owners who hire casual workers at busy times.
